name: A glowing torc
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
